question: Gave birth February 2014, had preeclampsia, anemia, premature birth (36 weeks)Taking Yasmin, prozac, multivitaminsHistory of ovarian cyst, kidney infection, recurrent UTIsRegular periods while using YasminProblem as follows:Light flow, bright red bleeding 5 days before period. Had residual brown discharge 2-3 days before period. Period arrived but flow was light and had heavy yellow discharge. Flow has remained light which is abnormal for me and I have had dark clots. Some sharp pelvic pain and lower back pain. Took one pregnancy test and it was negative. Just looking for possibilities for what this could be.
title: Abnormal Bleeding
